name: pride frog
notes:
this listing is for my original crochet amigurumi pride frog pattern.
the pattern is super easy to make, i have included lots of photo to help you along the way!
the finished frog measures 7 inches long and 6 inches wide (arm to arm)

materials:
worsted weight yarn: green for frog
rainbow flag: red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple
trans flag: light blue, pink and white
non-binary flag: yellow, white, purple and black
1- pair size 9.00 mm black safety eyes with washers.
scrap of black yarn or thread (for nose embroidery)
poly-fill stuffing
size g crochet hook
yarn needle
stitch marker

techniques:
single crochet
half-double crochet
single crochet 2 stitches together (decrease)
single crochet twice in the same single crochet stitch (increase)
half-double crochet twice in the same stitch (increase)
